name: Paul Rietzl
text: as i get older, the only sports i really care about are hockey and baseball, tho i still follow mma and football more casually.

children.name: Gabe Dion
children.text: @paulrietzl lets be realistic. Hockey is the shit. The Mtl-BOS series is amazing.

children.name: Tyler Walker
children.text: @paulrietzl Turning 24 has really changed things for you, huh? (Yes, sorry, this is a PR looks young joke)

children.name: Chris Pikula
children.text: @paulrietzl I'm 39 and have successfully got it down to zero sports.

children.name: Eric R. Patalinghug
children.text: @meddlingmage @paulrietzl It's just Hockey for me.

children.name: Evan Erwin
children.text: @meddlingmage @paulrietzl I got there way faster. ;) I wish Twitter was smart enough to filter out such things based on preferences.

children.name: Cedric Phillips
children.text: @misterorange @meddlingmage @paulrietzl DID SOMEONE SAY SPORTS?!

children.name: Evan Erwin
children.text: @CedricAPhillips @meddlingmage @paulrietzl http://t.co/VvgSFeApyx

children.name: Luis Scott-Vargas
children.text: @misterorange @CedricAPhillips @meddlingmage @paulrietzl "the things you like are worse than the things I like"

children.name: Evan Erwin
children.text: @lsv @CedricAPhillips @meddlingmage @paulrietzl Tale as old as time...

children.name: Mecha
children.text: @lsv @misterorange @CedricAPhillips @meddlingmage @paulrietzl There is irony in this discussion happening between serious Magic players

children.name: Tyler Walker
children.text: @mechalink @lsv @misterorange @CedricAPhillips @meddlingmage @paulrietzl I mostly "hate people" but I enjoy the shared experience of sports.

children.name: Tyler Walker
children.text: @mechalink @lsv @misterorange @CedricAPhillips @meddlingmage @paulrietzl Reading tweets about hockey (hate hockey) are fun, etc.

children.name: Dack Fayden
children.text: @lsv @misterorange @CedricAPhillips @meddlingmage @paulrietzl itâ€™s a close one between sports and awful webcomics, for sure

children.name: Chris Pikula
children.text: @lsv @misterorange @CedricAPhillips @paulrietzl I used to love sports. For some reason doesn't interest me anymore as I age.

children.name: Drew Petersen
children.text: @meddlingmage @lsv @misterorange @CedricAPhillips @paulrietzl Watch and teach the kid.  Makes all of it enjoyable again.

children.name: Inkwell Looter
children.text: @lsv @misterorange @CedricAPhillips @meddlingmage @paulrietzl Enthusiasms: http://t.co/DGOwdWA9Gy

children.name: Chris Pikula
children.text: @lsv @misterorange @CedricAPhillips @paulrietzl I was really trying to comment on aging more than I was commenting on sports.

children.name: Luis Scott-Vargas
children.text: @meddlingmage @misterorange @CedricAPhillips @paulrietzl yeah, I read your comment that way.

children.name: Victor Puente
children.text: @lsv @meddlingmage @misterorange @CedricAPhillips Opposite for me, no love as a child, learned to love them. But my job kind of forced it.

children.name: Matthew Watkins
children.text: @lsv @meddlingmage @misterorange @CedricAPhillips @paulrietzl I have less time to dedicate to sports. I chose to focus in MTG.

children.name: Ian
children.text: @meddlingmage @paulrietzl MMA is nice in that you can just pick it up and drop it whenever, since its all one-shots.

children.name: Heath Newton
children.text: @meddlingmage @paulrietzl 33 and would much rather play sports than watch them.  Never understood why people love watching them so much.

children.name: Victor Jenny
children.text: @MTGOTraders @meddlingmage @paulrietzl I'm not quite as old,still love a good fight, but as get old have fallen out of caring if a team wins

children.name: Tyler Walker
children.text: @MTGOTraders @meddlingmage @paulrietzl I enjoy a shared experience - either with friends/family, or with folks on twitter.

children.name: Lance Liberto
children.text: @MTGOTraders @meddlingmage @paulrietzl sports is the closest thing to a meritocracy in America. And it can galvanizes entire towns/cities.

children.name: Yog Sothoth
children.text: @paulrietzl It's because any sport that requires you to actually touch the ball is uncivilized. Wait another ten years. Golf's coming!

children.name: Michael Krumb
children.text: @paulrietzl @CedricAPhillips After watching ~70 hours of sports a week for a few years, NHL might be at the top of my list now (Playoffs!)

children.name: Paul Rietzl
children.text: @mkrumb @CedricAPhillips yea, it is very rare to find someone who gives hockey a real shot and doesn't fall in love.

children.name: Ted Knutson
children.text: @paulrietzl @mkrumb @CedricAPhillips  especially in the HD era
